The bible doesn't make sense to me
I can't even read through it all without going "wtf" god is a control freak and his son jesus is a weirdo.
I can't relate to them at all but good for you if you understand it.
Am I just bound for hell solely because I can't comprehend the word of the holy spirit?
I want to understand but can't, I don't think I ever will and most likely be dead by then.

Re: The bible doesn't make sense to me
As far as which version? CSV or YLT. But if you want the most accurate understanding, ignore the English and study the Greek and Hebrew words that are being spoken.
Another thing... you build anything without the right tools... so a good tool for interpretation is Hermeneutics. Use the hermeneutics tool and youll build a great understanding.
